climbs.name: Whoa - Hmmm - Ahhh
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Torgil Abrahmson, Cyndie Bransford, Kevin Bransford, Janiec Guitterrez & John Thacker, November 1992

content.description:
Down and left from the south face of Dissolution Rock is another smaller block with this route.

Climb the featured face right of a slanting crack past bolts. Not a gem, but worth a quick hit if in the area.

The name of the climb comes from an episode of Ren & Stimpy.

climbs.name: Unwashed Lederhosen
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Torgil Abrahmson, Cyndie Bransford, Kevin Bransford, Janiec Guiterrez, John Thacker, 11/1992.

content.description: Juggy fun up a dogleg dihedral crack to the left of 'Til Death Do Us Part. Somewhat runout finish, but exciting airy fun.
content.protection: Single rack to 2.5", bolted rap anchor atop Marital Sin.

climbs.name: Marital Sin
climbs.fa: Warren Hughes and Mike Van Volkem, October 1990

content.description:
This short but fun route climb the seam right of Life's A Bitch...

This is not a destination crag, but still a fun area to start or finish your day with a few more routes.

climbs.name: Life's a Bitch and then You Marry One

content.description: This is the attractive looking hand crack just right of the arete.  Scramble up an easy slab to the start of the crack, and then start jamming.  Good climbing, but wish it was longer. Very soft for 5.7

climbs.name: Till Death Do Us Part
climbs.fa: (TR) Warren Hughes, October 1990, FL: Todd Swain, July 1992 (solo)

content.description:
This route is easily set up for TR using the bolts to the right of

Life's a Bitch and Then You Marry One

(utilizing gear for a directional).  Climb a short crack to get established on the arete.  Up the arete using edges.  Moving left onto the face can be fun too.
